page.title: 01INTRODUCTION COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: Coventry S.W.is a suburban area of high population feeding off and including a section of the commercial centre of the city.The northern part of the sector contains{industrial {units,compact housing}and the{City {Centre}with its{shops,offices,banks and {Council}House.As you move southwards you pass through newer housing that charts the one time outward growth of the City.There is the large{Memorial Park}that commemorates the City's dead from two world wars.The{residents}of the area span the full range of the social scale,living in their own definite areas split up by the major roads that pass through the sector.Near the City Centre there are a number of {historical buildings}that are an important part of the City's heritage.
